entry.title: If I have removed a file by accident, and want to reinstate the file form a source code repository, then...
entry.content:
If I have removed a file by accident, and want to reinstate the file form a source code repository, then,

in subversion I will do

```

svn update file

```

in mercurial I will do

```

hg revert file

```

In git,

```

git checkout file

```

Reference:

http://hgbook.red-bean.com/read/mercurial-in-daily-use.html
